name: Kick or Treat (LukasLundin, Michael Halvorsen, Sebastian Lindfors, Splitterny)
name_original: Kick or Treat (LukasLundin, Michael Halvorsen, Sebastian Lindfors, Splitterny)
description:
Made for TGJs Halloween Game Jam

Theme: Trick or Treat

An endless runner where you kick kids to steal their candy. Avoid the angry mob of kids.
